alert.note: Alert for Baker; Calhoun; Dougherty; Early; Mitchell (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 15 at 5:24PM EDT until August 15 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Dougherty County in southwestern Georgia... Central Mitchell County in southwestern Georgia... Baker County in southwestern Georgia... Southern Calhoun County in southwestern Georgia... Northeastern Early County in southwestern Georgia... * Until 630 PM EDT. * At 524 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Arlington, or 8 miles southwest of Morgan, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Newton, Putney, Blakely, Camilla, Arlington, Baconton, Leary, Douglasville, Damascus, Iveys Mill, Holt, Mimsville, Williamsburg, Hentown, Rowena, Milford, Red Store Crossroads, Crestview, Cuba and Hawkinstown. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
